text: Asavar's Hunter
Asavar's Hunter may bring down the biggest of beasts and monsters.
The Tokmars tribe ventures in to Cathayan lands whenever they find a chance, plundering feats of battle.
Cathayan Influence
Unparalled hunters, the Tokmars hunt and tame even the wildest of beasts and monsters.
Unmatched Hunters
The secret to a nomadic life is nutrition, keeping the tribe well fed is essential when travelling long distances along the steppes.
Well Fed
With uncanning might, Surtha Lenks hewes the infamous spear of the Tokmars tribe.
Zar's Skewer
Surtha's Call is a recognizeable screeching sound that strikes fear in the minds of many.
Surtha's Call
None have a firmer grip over their tribe as Surtha Lenk, nailing each trophy to his belt as a display of dominance.
Tribal Dominance
The Tokmars warriors hunt for rare beasts and monsters whilst plundering all things created by men.
The Tokmars Tribe
The Kurgans are better tacticians as given credit for, using elements and terrain in their favour no matter the circumstances.
Kurgan Tactics
Marauder mobs are awarded even greater mobility when riding their crude chariots of bone and wood, lashed together with the guts and sinew of the vanquished.
Marauder Chariot
Tainted and savage they may be, but these behemoths remain willing to bear high-status Marauders into battle, trampling flat everything foolish enough to get in their way.
